casebody.data:
In Re DEPARTMENT OF COMMERCE, et al. No. 18A375. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 9, 2018. IT IS ORDERED that the orders of the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, dated July 3, 2018, August 17, 2018, and September 21, 2018, are stayed pending receipt of a response, due on or before October 11, 2018, by 4 p.m., and further order of the undersigned or of the Court.

UPON CONSIDERATION of the application of counsel for the applicants,
